name: Initial Q: The Reliquary Shrine of Saint Anthony Arriving at the Church in Constantinople and The Healing of the Emperor's Daughter

description: Initial Q: The Reliquary Shrine of Saint Anthony Arriving at the Church in Constantinople and The Healing of the Emperor's Daughter; Master of the Brussels Romuléon or workshop (Flemish, active about 1465); Bruges (or), Belgium; about 1465 - 1470; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 24.8 x 17.6 cm (9 3/4 x 6 15/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XI 8, fol. 47; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial Q: The Reliquary Shrine of Saint Anthony Arriving at the Church in Constantinople and The Healing of the Emperor's Daughter
